User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Conecta IA application.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Session.title: Session
Session.description: Represents a user's session with the Gemini AI.

startTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the session started.

endTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the session ended (can be null if the session is active).

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a session.

sender.description: Indicates who sent the message ('user' or 'gemini').

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

KnowledgeSource.title: KnowledgeSource
KnowledgeSource.description: Represents a source of knowledge added to the Gemini AI.

name.description: The name or title of the knowledge source.

url.description: The URL of the knowledge source (if applicable).

content.description: The actual content of the knowledge source (if not a URL).

uploadDate.description: Timestamp indicating when the knowledge source was uploaded.

AdminRole.title: AdminRole
AdminRole.description: The existence of a document in the 'roles_admin/{userId}' collection indicates that the user has admin privileges. The document itself can be empty or contain relevant metadata.

isAdmin.description: A flag to signify admin status, typically true.

assignedAt.description: Timestamp for when the admin role was assigned.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Accessible only by the user themselves.
Stores user sessions. Accessible only by the user themselves.
Stores messages within a session. Accessible only by the user themselves.
Stores knowledge sources added to the Gemini AI. Accessible only by admin users.
A document in this collection indicates that the user has admin privileges. Its existence grants admin rights.
